name: DeathTale
description:
How To Play:

The goal of the game is to get to the boss. You can attack your opponents and they can attack you as well. There are three types of enemies and one turret: 

1. skeleton - Skeletons aren't fast and they don't have much health

2. armored skeleton - These aren't fast, but they have much more health

3. runner skeleton - Runners are fast, they have 2 swords and they have the same health as normal skeletons.

4. skeletal turret - Shoots projectiles in spiral pattern.

If they you get damaged, you can go back to your camp to replenish your health.

Controls:

A/D - Move

Space - Jump

LMB - Spell Cast

E - Interact

Escape - Pause Menu
